c74object.name: mxp2
c74object.digest: Generate rhythms by the techniques of fractioning
c74object.description: mxp2 generates and outputs a layered rhythmical pattern from the interference of two synchronized monomial periodicities (generators), according to Chapter 4 of Schillinger's book. It creates a layered polyrhythm.

outlet.description: According to the formula n = a - b + 1, this outlet will output b patterns b0-bn in the format b0patbin(list).

method.name: gen
method.description: The gen message generates and outputs a layered rhythmical pattern from the interference of two synchronized monomial periodicities (generators). The periodicity of the generators must be included as arguments to this message. The syntax is thus: gen gena (int) genb (int).

method.name: bang
method.description: Outputs the resulting patterns calculated from the arguments or gen message.
